name: MYTH - Steam Edition
description: A world of shadows. A world of light. In the world of light where no shadows exist lived a boy - Meito Tanabe. One day, he met a girl who possessed a shadow - Shimon. She brings him to her world - a place filled with shadows.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 640x480 Resolution Minimum DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound PCM Compatible
